title: O Come, My Lord

tokens.lyric: O come my Lord; I beg You to come.

lines.raw: [F7]O come my Lord; I beg You to come.

tokens.lyric: O come to me and live within my heart;

lines.raw: [Bb]O come to me and live within my heart;

tokens.lyric: Come live in my heart so black and impure,

lines.raw: [Bbm]Come live in my heart so black and impure,

tokens.lyric: That bears the burden of my sin.

lines.raw: [F]That bears the burden of my sin.

tokens.lyric: O come! My Lord, You are the fire that burns so bright;

lines.raw: [F]O come! My Lord, You are the fire that burns so bright;

tokens.lyric: Come burn within my heart and cleanse my sins,

lines.raw: [C]Come burn within my heart and cleanse my sins,

tokens.lyric: O how I pray that You will soon come;

lines.raw: [Bb]O how I pray that You will soon come;

tokens.lyric: Come to me O Lord, Live within my heart.

lines.raw: [Gm7]Come to me O Lord, Live within my heart.

tokens.lyric: O come my Lord; I beg You to come.

lines.raw: [C7]O come my Lord; I beg You to come.

tokens.lyric: Come dwell with me my altar now awaits;

lines.raw: [F]Come dwell with me my altar now awaits;

tokens.lyric: O come to the altar waiting for you,

lines.raw: [Bb]O come to the altar waiting for you,

tokens.lyric: But lost and hidden by the night.

lines.raw: [Bbm]But lost and hidden by the night.

tokens.lyric: O come! My Lord, You are the light that fills the world;

lines.raw: [F]O come! My Lord, You are the light that fills the world;

tokens.lyric: Come purify my altar by Your light.

lines.raw: [C]Come purify my altar by Your light.

tokens.lyric: O how I pray that You will soon come;

lines.raw: [Bb]O how I pray that You will soon come;

tokens.lyric: Many altars wait, Dwell with them, O Lord.

lines.raw: [Gm7]Many altars wait, Dwell with them, O Lord.

tokens.lyric: O come my Lord; I beg You to come.

lines.raw: [C7]O come my Lord; I beg You to come.

tokens.lyric: O come and bring new life to all the earth;

lines.raw: [F]O come and bring new life to all the earth;

tokens.lyric: O come save the world from dying in pain;

lines.raw: [Bb]O come save the world from dying in pain;

tokens.lyric: Restore our sinful world.

lines.raw: [Bbm]Restore our sinful world.

tokens.lyric: O come! My Lord, You are the strength that will not change;

lines.raw: [F]O come! My Lord, You are the strength that will not change;

tokens.lyric: Come end our evil ways and tragic times.

lines.raw: [C]Come end our evil ways and tragic times.

tokens.lyric: O how I pray that You will soon come;

lines.raw: [Bb]O how I pray that You will soon come;

tokens.lyric: Crying in my heart, Come to us, O Lord.

lines.raw: [Gm7]Crying in my heart, Come to us, O Lord.
